name: col
description: a remake of the classic Colonization game
author: ymdwiseguy

scripts.copy:images: copyfiles -u 4 src/main/resources/img/* src/main/resources/static/assets/img/ && copyfiles -u 4 src/main/resources/img/**/* src/main/resources/static/assets/img/
scripts.copy:assets: npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:images
scripts.dev: npm run clean:static && npm run copy:assets && concurrently --kill-others 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js'
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean:static && npm run copy:assets && npm run css:dev && npm run js:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:static && npm run copy:assets && npm run css:prod && npm run js:prod
